channel.title: No servers work offline!
channel.description: Every server I've downloaded I tried to run the .bat folder after changing jdk. It works but I can't login.. So then I change to my IPv4 address, save and compile.. Still doesn't work. One of the clients just says checking versions, but stays there and doesn't move. They show no errors or anything and still don't work. How can I fix, small tut please!

item.title: No servers work offline!
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

If you want to play it offline, set the IP to 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: No servers work offline!
item.dc:creator: @FailureToComply FailureToComply
item.description:
@FailureToComply wrote:

Every server I’ve downloaded I tried to run the .bat folder after changing jdk. It works but I can’t login… So then I change to my IPv4 address, save and compile… Still doesn’t work. One of the clients just says checking versions, but stays there and doesn’t move. They show no errors or anything and still don’t work. How can I fix, small tut please!

Read full topic
